messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] 3 boy families
messages.msgSnippet: Count me almost in on the 3 boy list.  My triplets are almost three and I ve subscribed to the list so that I can benefit from thinking about what you all have
messages.messageBody:
Count me almost in on the 3 boy list. My triplets are almost three and I've
subscribed to the list so that I can benefit from thinking about what you all
have to say as they grow. Just finished Learning All the Time by John Holt
and am only sorry I didn't read it sooner. Very exciting book. Nicki just
introduced herself as having a 5 yr old and I'll be watching how it goes with
her. Having three the same age is a slightly different kettle of fish in all
areas, but kids are kids everywhere. I live in central NJ and haven't hooked
up with our local support group yet because the boys still nap in the
afternoon and the group meets once a week at a park/skating rink during
naptime.
